price: 106. Tama taamâ finqat как yabne mari (koros kinnuk) galto keenik jahannam gira koroositeeniih Yi- ayootaa (Qhuraan kinnuk) kee Yi- farmoytit anqasah haysitccnimih sabbatah.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ بِمَا كَفَرُواْ وَٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِي وَرُسُلِي هُزُوًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika jazāuhum jahannamu bimā kafarū wa-ittakhadhū āyātī warusulī huzuwan
